#summary How to install MSYS shell environment for Windows

MSYS is a collection of GNU utilities to build applications and programs which depend on UNIX. Before the installation of MSYS, [Installing_MinGW MinGW] must be intalled in _C:/MinGW_.

 # The components of MSYS can be downloaded from [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=2435&package_id=24963 SourceForge Web Page]:
  * [http://sourceforge.net/project/downloading.php?group_id=2435&use_mirror=heanet&filename=bash-3.1-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2&28137186 bash]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/bzip2-1.0.3-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2  bzip2]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/coreutils-5.97-MSYS-1.0.11-snapshot.tar.bz2 coreutils]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/cpmake-3.81-MSYS-1.0.11-1-bin.tar.gz cpmake]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/csmake-3.81-MSYS-1.0.11-2.tar.bz2 csmake]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/diffutils-2.8.7-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2 diffutils]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/findutils-4.3.0-MSYS-1.0.11-3-bin.tar.gz findutils]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/gawk-3.1.5-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2 gawk]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/lzma-4.43-MSYS-1.0.11-1-bin.tar.gz lzma]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/make-3.81-MSYS-1.0.11-2.tar.bz2 make]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/MSYS-1.0.11-20080821-dll.tar.gz MSYS 1.0.11]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/msysCORE-1.0.11-20080826.tar.gz msysCore]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/tar-1.13.19-MSYS-2005.06.08.tar.bz2 tar]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/mingw/texinfo-4.11-MSYS-1.0.11-1.tar.bz2 textinfo]

 # Create a msys directory folder in _C:\msys\usr_.
 # Extract downloaded files in the created folder.
 # Run _pi.bat_ in postinstall directory. A console window will be opened.
  * Press _y_ to continue with the intallation.
  * Press _y_ to indicate that MinGW is intalled.
  * The MinGW intallation directory is _c:/MinGW_.
  * Press a key to finish with the intallation.
